function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of biophilic design, leading to a lack of nature-related features and patterns in the built environment.","Impact":"Reduced psychological and physiological health benefits for building occupants.","Mitigation":"Ensure comprehensive integration of nature-inspired elements and patterns into the design and construction process.","Technologies":"Biophilic design software for simulation and visualization of nature-inspired elements.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with mental health concerns.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, and building developers."},{"Description":"Insufficient accessibility to nature-related features and spaces, limiting the potential health benefits of biophilic design.","Impact":"Decreased opportunities for stress reduction, cognitive restoration, and overall well-being for occupants.","Mitigation":"Provide easily accessible nature-infused spaces and consider the proximate access to natural elements.","Technologies":"Smart building design with integrated green spaces and nature-inspired architectural elements.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and urban planners.","Owner":"Building developers, urban planning authorities, and facility management teams."},{"Description":"Failure to consider the impact of biophilic design on airborne disease transmission and contagion within the built environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to inadequate ventilation, air quality, and spatial layout.","Mitigation":"Integrate biophilic design with advanced air filtration systems and ventilation strategies to mitigate disease transmission risks.","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems, and natural ventilation solutions.","People":"Building occupants, especially vulnerable individuals, and healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Building developers, HVAC engineers, and infection control specialists."}]}
